name: John MARSDEN v. PEERLESS INSURANCE COMPANY

parties: John MARSDEN v. PEERLESS INSURANCE COMPANY.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The defendant’s motion to dismiss this appeal as premature is granted.
DORIS, J., did not participate.

attorneys: Joseph A. Capineri, Pawtucket, for plaintiff. .
Gunning, LaFazia & Gnys, Inc., Lincoln C. Almond, Providence, for defendant.
casebody.head_matter:
John MARSDEN v. PEERLESS INSURANCE COMPANY.
No. 79-443-A.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
Jan. 24, 1980.
Joseph A. Capineri, Pawtucket, for plaintiff. .
Gunning, LaFazia & Gnys, Inc., Lincoln C. Almond, Providence, for defendant.
